name: df-rngoiso
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2
body: |- wceq(crngiso, cmpo(s0, s1, crngo, crngo, crab(s2, co(cv(s0), crnghom, cv(s1)), wf1o(cv(s2), crn(cfv(c1st, cv(s0))), crn(cfv(c1st, cv(s1)))))))
bodyPretty: ⊢ RngIso =(s0 ∈ RingOps, s1 ∈ RingOps ↦ { s2 ∈(s0[RngHom]s1)|(s2 : ran((1st ` s0))↔ ran((1st ` s1)))})
comment: Define the function which gives the set of ring isomorphisms between two given rings. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 16-Jun-2011.)
